results.title: The SafetyWing Digital Nomad Residency
results.description:
The SafetyWing Digital Nomad Residency


Calling all current and aspiring digital nomads: your dream opportunity is waiting!¬†

SafetyWing is funding one persons next global adventure with up to $4,000 in reimbursements to help you on your journey as a digital nomad.

Whether you are a seasoned world explorer or someone who has always dreamt of far-off places, this could be your moment! The only requirement to apply is a deep desire to travel widely and live freely.

Who is SafetyWing?
SafetyWing envisions a world where borderless living is accessible and safe. We want to unlock your global aspirations by helping you explore the world, with the peace of mind that comes with knowing you‚Äôre in good hands.

üåé What‚Äôs in it for you:
  • Support to build your ideal version of freedom worth US$4,000 (think flights, accommodations, skill building and more)
  • Mentorship from the SafetyWing team (learn from other nomads!)
  • Guidance on visas, insurance, budgeting, and logistics
  • Access to our global community

What your US$4,000 reward could cover:
Reimbursed only ‚Äî you must show proof of every expense.
  • Flights to your chosen destination¬†
  • Accommodation for your first month¬†
  • Coworking pass or workspace setup¬†
  • Local transport, SIM card, and basic setup costs¬†
  • Skill-building or career growth¬†
  • Work tools/equipment needed to support your nomad adventure¬†
  • Visa fees or document renewals
  • Any practical relocation cost directly tied to starting or upgrading your nomad life¬†

üß™ Important guidelines
  • No cash is given directly
  • We reimburse up to US$4,000 only for approved, proven costs. Anything above $4,000 and/or anything without proper receipts will not be reimbursed
  • You must keep all receipts
  • Everything must be tied to starting or sustaining your digital nomad life

üìù How to apply
Tell us your story!

Submit:
  1. A 1‚Äì2 minute long video to introduce yourself, and tell us why we should fund your adventure. Post the video to any of your socials (LinkedIn, Instagram orTikTok), tag us, and link it below. Don‚Äôt submit the application without linking to your video. Some things you might want to tell us:
    • Why you‚Äôre excited about the The SafetyWing Digital Nomad Residency (required)
    • What‚Äôs your ‚ÄúI need a new life‚Äù moment?
    • Why are you drawn to the digital nomad lifestyle?
    • What‚Äôs the funniest, weirdest, or most chaotic sign the universe gave you to apply?
    • What version of you are you trying to unlock with this opportunity?
    • What would winning this unlock that you can‚Äôt unlock alone right now?
    • If your future self could send you one message, what would they say?
    • Which part of your story makes you think: ‚ÄúYeah‚Ä¶ they should pick me‚Äù?
    • Why do you think the world needs your story right now?
    • What‚Äôs the most chaotic thing about you that secretly makes you a great nomad candidate?
  2. Answer a few written questions
  3. Tell us how you‚Äôd spend $4,000 towards your dream life
  4. Upload a r√©sum√©

üèÖ How will we choose the winner?
We are looking for someone who‚Äôs not afraid of getting vulnerable and sharing their story with the SafetyWing community and beyond. If you have always dreamt of sustaining a digital nomadic lifestyle, we want to hear from you!

Requirements
You should:
  • Be 18+
  • Have a story, not a r√©sum√© ‚Äî we want your honesty, not perfection
  • Be willing to share parts of your journey (photos, reflections, updates)
  • Be comfortable being featured in SafetyWing content (social, blog, newsletter)
  • Have the ability to take time off / work remotely during the project period
  • Hold a passport valid for at least 6 months¬†

How We‚Äôll Choose the Winner
We will look for someone who:
  • Has a clear ‚Äúwhy.‚Äù A genuine desire for change, adventure, or reinvention
  • Shows vulnerability. We want to hear your story!
  • Shows commitment to embarking on this digital nomad journey
  • Has a story that resonates. Something others can see themselves in
  • Has curiosity. People who think deeply about life, who question norms
We‚Äôre not picking the person with the most likes or the prettiest video.
We‚Äôre picking the one whose story moves us, and the one we can genuinely help take their next step.

üöÄ We look forward to hearing from you!

results.title: Freelance Writer
results.description:
Our organization is seeking content writers to create articles and blog posts on a variety of topics.

¬†

The rate of pay is $20 per 100 words (this comes out to approximately $100 per article or $50 per hour).

¬†

Some topics you may be asked to write about include the following (you can always turn down a topic if you do not feel comfortable writing about it, however if you have experience or expertise in a specific area, please let us know):

¬†

  • Health & beauty
  • Fitness
  • Home Decor
  • Fashion
  • Sports
  • Do it yourself
  • Finance
  • Legal
  • Medical
  • Family/Parenting
  • Relationships
  • Real Estate
  • Restaurants
  • Contracting (plumbing, pool building, remodeling, etc.)

¬†

These are just some of the more general industries and topics that we cover.

¬†

Requirements:

  • We ask that all work be completed using a word processor such as Microsoft Word or Open Office
  • A reliable internet connection and the ability to meet deadlines
  • Good communication skills and respond in a timely manner to editorial staff when they ask for updates on tasks, etc
  • Work well as a team member with the rest of our content management and editorial staff



Note: Applicants to this job signaled that accessing some writing tasks may require payment.

results.title: Copywriter
results.description:
¬†

WHO WE'RE LOOKING FOR
The ideal copywriter has excellent English writing skills and is excited to write high-quality, SEO-driven content that aligns with detailed, client-specific guidelines. Projects most commonly include writing web pages for eCommerce and lead generation business sites such as category pages, product descriptions, and blog posts. Our clientele is constantly evolving. We produce content for these and many other industry verticals:
¬†
Fashion (both mass-market and luxury)
Skincare & Beauty
Tech & Software**
Finance & Investing**
Law (family law, product liability, divorce, etc.)**
Education
Home Improvement
Automobiles & Motorcycles (OEM and aftermarket accessories)
Health and Wellness**
Medical / Clinical**
Digital Marketing
SEO / PR / Advertising / Marketing**
**Writers with a background in these highly specialized fields are strongly encouraged to apply.
The ideal candidate for this position is a multifaceted technical and creative writer with at least two to four years of professional, non-academic experience. Candidates should understand how to write content that effortlessly blends SEO best practices and brand priorities for finished work that‚Äôs engaging, creative, and ROI-driven. Candidates should also be willing and able to complete careful research in order to gain a strong understanding of various industries. Candidates should be prepared to provide portfolios featuring published work. Once an offer has been extended, writers will be asked to take a brief training course.
¬†
Compensation
Writers are paid on a per-word basis. The rate is assessed according to our KPI rubric (key performance indicators) with an automatic raise after 400 and 800 pages have gone live on our client's websites.
Initial compensation is up to $0.06 per word with $0.034 per word being the most typical compensation level. This is $30 or $17 per page of 500 words.
After 400 pages live, the top marginal rate increases to $0.064 per word with the most typical rate of $0.038 per word, or $32 and $19 per page. After 800 pages live, the top marginal rate increases to $0.07 per word with $0.044 per word being the most typical, or $35 and $22 per page.
